description:
•  Easy to operate with dual start/stop function  — Close lid for a spin speed up to 7000 rpm

•  Smooth and quiet operation (noise level ≤45dB)

•  Accelerates and brakes in seconds

•  Safe, endurable and robust rotor with clamp locking design

•  Compatible with 2mLx8 and PCR8x4 rotors

•  Quick-change rotor without any tool
PRODUCT PARAMETERS
Max. Speed
7000rpm
Max. RCF
2680×g
Rotor Capacity
0.2/0.5/1.5/2mL×8 | 0.2mL×32PCR tubes | 0.2mL×4PCR8-strips
Run Time
Continuous operation
Driving Motor DC motor
DC motor
Power Requirements
AC100-240V，50Hz/60Hz； 20W
Noise Level
≤45dB
Dimension [D×W×H]
160x170x122mm
Weight

Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
